page: MI40042: Tunneling And Underground Space Technology

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Rock mass classification, RMR and Q-system, stability analysis of tunnels, elastic and plastic deformation, stress conditions, support requirement of a tunnel under various types of rocks, tunnel boring machine, selection criteria, tunneling under massive structures, numerical modeling of tunnels. Tunnel ventilation.
page: MI40042: Tunneling And Underground Space Technology
